title: Update the Weather App
content: Add #006db7 as the header color in the Weather App.

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
content: Peanut butter is the key to these easy cookies. In fact, that's almost all that's in them, plus an egg, a cup of sugar, and some flaky salt.

title: Buy tickets
content: Buy a train tickets on the 10/04/2022 and on the 15/04/2022

title: Send Kate the letter
content: On the 15/04 send Kate weekly report. Remind her update work tasks.

title: A new screen in the App
content: Create a screen of favorite cities in the Weather App.

title: Write comment to the film
content: Absolutely astounding fantasy extravaganza. I was entirely immersed and immensely amazed.
